Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a grand slam in the sixth inning
Edwin Díaz struck out Kyle Schwarber with two runners aboard to end the game
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets' first champagne-soaked clinching celebration in Citi Field’s 16-season history

For the NL East champion Phillies, it was a bitter exit early in the playoffs and a disappointing step backward after they advanced to the 2022 World Series and then lost Games 6 and 7 of the 2023 NLCS at home to Arizona
Bryce Harper and the Phillies are still looking for the franchise’s third championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: New York finished off the rival Phillies in Game 4 of their best-of-five Division Series, winning 3-1 to wrap up a postseason series at home for the first time in 24 years
